article_title: With Obamacare Help, Hospital Capital Spending Rises Again

article_metadata.description: More than half of the nation’s nonprofit hospitals expect to increase capital spending in coming years as the Affordable Care Act brings health facilities more revenue from patients in its second year of broader coverage, a new analysis indicates. Fitch Ratings said 53% of nonprofit hospitals expect to increase capital spending [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
